review:
1. I have zero notifications even when a few have liked my video. I have no ways to find who liked it.

2. Videos do pause automatically after spending sometime surfing through videos in video feed.

3. When we go to a creator's page, open a video and then scroll to move to next, videos don't get aligned properly on screen. 

4. Provide an option to become a beta tester through app.

5. "Comments" option was not really needed. I liked it's absence. But would love to see a "dislike" button.

6. Day mode and dark mode both should be there. My iPhone is set to turn to one of these modes depending upon sunrise and sunset. Would be great if your app follows it too.

6. Last but not the least, I hope you have a control and plans to avoid spreading cringe content. Also focus on not spreading only big creator's videos who were famous on Tik Tok. People didn't really like them.
title: Points to focus

developerResponse.body:
Thanks Vinnie for such a detailed feedback!
We'll work on it and will make sure that these are sorted.
Do mail us at reviews@mojapp.in in case you have more feedback
Ankur

review:
Actually very happy that our Indians have developed such an app,, Appreciation for the great work. But yeah!!!  Please do look into the matter below. Which makes it so inefficient. After all I really appreciate the initiative for the development of this app.

1)I’m not able to see the notifications on my profile nor the likes are getting displayed there

2) When we are looking at the newsfeed theres a problem in that, and it feels so inefficient in which we are unable to check who liked our videos or who shared it. 

3) The page doesn’t get refresh when there’s a problem raises 

4) Its response is very slow and late.
title: Great initiative a bit inefficient

review:
It’s a great start by our indian company but to meet international expectation lots of work to be done on this app.

We don’t get any notification if any one likes the video or follows you. You can’t come to know who is following you and who has liked your videos. Also there are many small small things need to be done. I expect moj team to looks into this and makes changes. Wanted to see our indian app grow like any other apps.
title: Lots of work to be done to make it entertaining

developerResponse.body:
Hi

We are working on your feedbacks

Thanks you

It seems like it is tiktok only, people are posting so much hate and there are so many har rasmen to and bully videos here, I have reported many but no action is being taken, those are still there, just pure cringe, hate speech, bully, discrimination and what not,
I seriously thought for once that it would be better but no, it is even worst than tiktok,
Absolute no standards, just to get fame people are posting absolute garbage, and they are ridiculing LGBTQIA+ community and so many more and yet you are doing nothing, I think just remove the option of report if you are not doing anything when we report.
